item.title: I Genuinely Thought The MCU Had Broken One Of Its Most Sacred Rules In The Finale Of Thunderbolts*
item.description: Thunderbolts* featured a particularly dark moment that, for a minute, made me think that it had broken one of the franchise's most sacred rules.

item.title: “These Guys Know How To Shoot Action”: The Fight Scenes In Karate Kid: Legends Will Break New Ground For The Franchise, Star Says
item.description: Karate Kid: Legends star Ben Wang hypes the fight scenes featured in the beloved franchise's latest entry and how they surpass the earlier movies.

item.title: After Sentry's MCU Debut, I Need A Movie Adaptation Of Marvel's Biggest Hulk Vs Sentry Fight Now More Than Ever
item.description: Sentry has made a big splash in the MCU, but I think the character needs to be properly tested in order to advance in the MCU as a superhero.

item.title: Aubrey O'Day Says She Will Not Testify at Diddy's Trial
item.description: Aubrey O’Day says she will not take the stand in the high-profile Sean "Diddy" Combs trial. The former Danity Kane singer confirmed her decision on T....

item.title: Diddy Party Pics From Night He Allegedly Overdosed at Playboy Mansion
